translated.DESC1: Toronto Stock Exchange (TSX) is one of the largest stock exchanges in the world. As of February 2015, it has the greatest number of security listings of any exchange in North America and has the second-most listings worldwide.
translated.NAME: Toronto

translated.DESC1: The New York Stock Exchange (NYSE), sometimes known as the "Big Board",is an American stock exchange located at 11 Wall Street, Lower Manhattan, New York City, New York.
translated.NAME: New York

translated.DESC1: The Shenzhen Stock Exchange (SZSE) is one of China's three stock exchanges, alongside the Shanghai Stock Exchange and Hong Kong Stock Exchange. It is based in Shenzhen, Guangdong.
translated.NAME: Shenzhen

translated.DESC1: The Stock Exchange of Hong Kong Limited (SEHK) is a stock exchange located in Hong Kong. It is Asia's third largest stock exchange in terms of market capitalization behind the Tokyo Stock Exchange and Shanghai Stock Exchange.
translated.NAME: Hong Kong

translated.DESC1: The Shanghai Stock Exchange (SSE), is a stock exchange that is based in the city of Shanghai, China. It is one of the two stock exchanges operating independently in the People's Republic of China.
translated.NAME: Shanghai

translated.DESC1: Korea Exchange (KRX) is the sole securities exchange operator in South Korea. It is headquartered in Busan, and has an office for cash markets and market oversight in Seoul.
translated.NAME: Seoul

translated.DESC1: The Tokyo Stock Exchange, which is called Tosho or TSE for short, is a stock exchange located in Tokyo, Japan. It is the fourth largest stock exchange in the world.
translated.NAME: Tokyo

translated.DESC1: Australian Securities Exchange,(ASX), is an Australian public company that operates Australia's primary securities exchange, the Australian Securities Exchange. It was formed on 1 April 1987.
translated.NAME: Sydney

translated.DESC1: The Dubai Financial Market (DFM) is a stock exchange located in Dubai, United Arab Emirates. It was founded on March 26, 2000.
translated.NAME: Dubai

translated.DESC1: The Kuwait Stock Exchange (KSE) is the national stock market of Kuwait.
translated.NAME: Kuwait

translated.DESC1: The Amsterdam Stock Exchange is the former name for the stock exchange based in Amsterdam. It merged on 22 September 2000 with the Brussels Stock Exchange and the Paris Stock Exchange to form Euronext, and is now known as Euronext Amsterdam.
translated.NAME: Amsterdam

translated.DESC1: The NASDAQ Stock Market, commonly known as the NASDAQ, is an American stock exchange. It is the second-largest exchange in the world by market capitalization, behind only the New York Stock Exchange.
translated.DESC2: The exchange platform is owned by Nasdaq, Inc., which also owns the OMX stock market network and several other US stock and options exchanges.
translated.NAME: NASDAQ

translated.DESC1: The BM&F BOVESPA is a stock exchange located at Sao Paulo, Brazil. As of December 31, 2011 it had a market capitalization of US $1.22 Trillion, making it in the 13th largest stock exchange in the world.
translated.NAME: São Paulo

translated.DESC1: Bolsa de Madrid (Madrid Stock Exchange) is the largest and most international of Spain's four regional stock exchanges (the others are located in Barcelona, Valencia, and Bilbao) that trade shares and convertible bonds and fixed income securities.
translated.NAME: Madrid

translated.DESC1: The London Stock Exchange (LSE) is a stock exchange located in the City of London in the United Kingdom. As of December 2014, the Exchange had a market capitalisation of US$6.06 trillion.
translated.NAME: London

translated.DESC1: SIX Swiss Exchange (SWX), based in Zurich, is Switzerland's principal stock exchange (the other being Berne eXchange). SIX Swiss Exchange also trades other securities such as Swiss government bonds and derivatives such as stock options.
translated.NAME: Zurich

translated.DESC1: The Frankfurt Stock Exchange (FWB) is the world's 10th largest stock exchange by market capitalization. Located in Frankfurt, Germany, the Frankfurt Stock Exchange is owned and operated by Deutsche (FWB)
translated.NAME: Frankfurt

translated.DESC1: JSE Limited (previously the JSE Securities Exchange and the Johannesburg Stock Exchange) is the largest stock exchange in Africa. It is situated at the corner of Maude Street and Gwen Lane in Sandton, Johannesburg, South Africa.
translated.NAME: Johannesburg

translated.DESC1: Moscow Exchange (MMVB or MICEX) is the largest exchange group in Russia, was one of the largest universal stock exchanges in the Russian Federation and East Europe. MICEX opened in 1992 and was the leading Russian stock exchange.
translated.NAME: Moscow

translated.DESC1: The Bombay Stock Exchange (BSE) is an Indian stock exchange located at Dalal Street, Kala Ghoda, Mumbai, Maharashtra, India. Established in 1875.
translated.NAME: Mumbai
